details.description: Register your invention as a patent to protect your intellectual property
details.more_information:
The application fee is Â£230, including search and examination fee. You also need:

- a detailed description of your invention 
- a legal and technical statement explaining how your invention is distinctive from other patented inventions 

A [patent attorney](http://www.cipa.org.uk/ "Chartered Institute of Patent Attorneys"){:rel="external"} can help with complex patent applications.
details.introduction: Apply online with the UK Intellectual Property Office, the European Patent Office, or the World Intellectual Property Organisation.
